amendment.description: To clarify the duration of certain sanctions against Burma, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 883 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 883 proposed by Senator McConnell to Amendment SA 882. (consideration: CR S7695; text: CR S7695) To clarify the duration of certain sanctions against Burma, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 883 proposed by Senator McConnell to Amendment SA 882.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 883 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
